name: Pinball Meme Soundboard
description:
Soundboards are boring! Up your game with this pinball meme soundboard!

Hit memes to score points and become the dankest player!
Achieve score milestones for even more memes!

How to play:
   1. Tap the lower corners of the screen.
   2. Hit dank memes to score.
   3. Don't die.

Get it now on Amazon!
